EmailTemplate.subject: Update on Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I’m pleased to report we are making progress on your Pivotal Support case {!Case.CaseNumber}. Below are current status and next steps:
<ce-instructions>CE to add a message to the customer here. The following are some suggestions in order of what should be in this message to the customer:
- Brief message outlining the progress you’re making - If necessary, request further information from the customer - If necessary, request log files from the customer - Ask any other questions you need the customer to answer </ce-instructions>
### NEXT STEPS: - What are the next steps to be added here - When is the next update due/expected
### EVIDENCE FROM LOGFILE INVESTIGATION: - Any important log information for the case to be added here
Feel free to reply to this message if I may further clarify any of the above information or you wish to discuss, directly.
Kind regards,
<CE name>
